reviews.text: Makryammos Bungalows is a beautiful hotel set amidst a wooded park on what has to be one of the best beaches I have ever been to in Greece. The sand is almost white. The sea is crystal clear. A solitary swim here at dusk is pure heaven. The rooms are built of local natural stone, making them blend in with the landscape. And while it is an understandably popular choice with families, the extensive grounds allow peace and relaxation for those without buckets and spades. But there’s more! It has deer. It has peacocks. It has perfectly mixed cocktails at the Delfini bar. It has first class amenities without any of the associated pretentiousness. I will certainly be back.
reviews.title: Heaven on Thasos

reviews.text: We spend week in the beginning of August 2011 and we had very relaxing vacation. The rooms are clean, the food in the restaurant - very delicious, the beach - nice. I recommend this hotel!
reviews.title: Very good hotel in great location

reviews.text: We stayed in this hotels in July, with our 2 year old daughter, for 15 nights. The bungalows are a little outdated and need renovation and I think they are definitely not a 4 star. The buffet is excellent, definitely 5 star, with great abundance of food, both for the breakfast and the dinner. The dining restaurant is excellent, very close to beach with excellent sea view. The beach is perfect, water was warm, clean and great for small children. Reception and staff were very friendly and helpful, especially the hotel manager. We first booked standard bungalow which was 250m up in the hill from the beach and was difficult to climb several times a day with our child but then we requested another which was closer to the reception and the beach and we were given one without problem. The hotel had good entertainment program at nights. One night they had show with clowns and face painting and the children were really excited. Another night they had live Greek music then disco night etc. There are a lot of peacocks and fawns in the complex and our daughter was really excited. They came in front of our balcony every day and we fed them.
reviews.title: Great hotel for relaxed family holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bungalows very good and well cleaned daily, free air conditioning and safe a bonus. The buffet food was amazing both for quality and choice, breakfast or evening. Spotlessly clean and well served, you can dine inside or out. The staff could not do enough to help you, all very courteous and kind, which was a feat in itself as some guests appeared very rude towards them (possibly clash of nationalities?)...
reviews.title: What a superb place with fantastic staff

reviews.text: The pool, sea and beach are so welcoming and clean, bar drinks very reasonably priced and handy. The small shop has most things, and very helpful for information.
reviews.title: Thanks for your reviews, everything is true

reviews.text: We had an absolute great vacation at this hotel. The location is fantastic and the beach is simply unique. White sand, turquoise sea, great for children. The hotel and its bungalows are located on a hillside nested under pine trees. From the beach and ocean you see nothing of the hotel but a pine treed hill side.
reviews.title: Great vacation destination

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The lobby, bar and restaurant area are located right by the sea and offer a great view. These facilities are very modern and follow a lounge style with the according music in the background. The staff is very friendly, efficient and makes you feel welcome at all times.
reviews.title: Second time and again excellent

reviews.text: The bungalows are spread across the hillside and depending on where you live you might have a bit of a walk uphill to your room. The gardens of the hotel are well kept and are enjoyable to walk through.
reviews.title: Great for families: Fantastic beach and great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are not in the best condition though and cleanliness could be better. Particularly the bathroom we had was not in the best condition. However, the overall condition was acceptable and did not diminish the overall experience. The rooms have a small TV, refigerator and safe. All of them have a nice terrace with chairs, which in most cases will offer you a great view onto the Mediterrean Sea.
reviews.title: Faultless Location

reviews.text: It should be noted though that two chairs at the beach and an umbrella do cost a fee of 7 EUR a day, and if you are looking for towels it is another Euro per day.
reviews.title: We loved Makryammos Bungalows and would recommend it to our friends

reviews.text: Hotel Makryammos is an excellent hotel for families, couples and friends looking for a relaxed holiday.

reviews.text: It was wonderful vocation...we stayed during July, with two children (13old & 3old) and it was more than my expectation...Before I traveled there, I read in the tripadviser and some comments confused me, and a little I was afraid that it will not be like it was showed in website, but as soon as I arrived I realize that everything will be perfect, the bungalows was wonderful and very clean, very quiet , the view was perfect, and the restaurant, there was the various food, so I will recommend to everyone who like the relaxing vocation.

reviews.text: I have reproof about the rooms and the maintenance - In one of our rooms A/C was not working (it was early season and we tried it in warm mode) and I report it to the reception. They asked one of the stuff to come to repair and he promised to go right after but his didn't happened in next several hours and I had to go second time to the reception where finally they gave me electric heater instead. Still in this room the temperature was lower than normal during our stay.
reviews.title: excellent location, very overpriced
